content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/X-E5Hw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Org Business Partnering Services\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to learn what kind of group is and how requests connected with this group are processed.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
